products.title: Harewood Plain Black Roller Blind
products.description: Our harewood plain is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With its seductive colour palette and attractive prices harewood is one of their bestselling plain ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. The high-quality harewood plain black roller blind is ideal for any room.
